name: Monstermon: Isekai Friendship Simulator
description:
P***mon -clone made with stolen assets from /agdg/. Not much of a game at the moment.

Not porn (yet)

Controls:

  • Movement: Arrow keys, wasd, or  ,aoe
  • Accept: z or ;
  • Back: x or q
  • Open menu (from the overworld): Enter

No controller support

Features:

  • 9 stolen enemy monsters to discover (can you find them all????)
  • Debug kill insta-gibs anything
  • Infinitely respawning chest giving you healing items every time
  • Mysterious house

Saving and loading should work although there is little point in doing so since the game only has 2 rooms.
